Giriwinangun di Jambi Resmi Jadi Desa Sadar Jaminan Sosial
01 Nov 2019, 18:15 by BPJS Kesehatan, https://www.facebook.com/CNNIndonesia


Melalui program Desa Sadar Jaminan Sosial, masyarakat dapat memahami pentingnya program perlindungan jaminan sosial yang diselenggarakan BPJS Ketenagakerjaan. (Foto: Dok. BPJS Ketenagakerjaan)

Jakarta, CNN Indonesia -- BPJS Ketenagakerjaan memiliki cara tersendiri dalam memberikan pemahaman akan pentingnya jaminan sosial kepada seluruh warga negara Indonesia. Hal tersebut diwujudkan melalui program Desa Sadar Jaminan Sosial Ketenagakerjaan yang saat ini telah mencapai ratusan desa di seluruh Indonesia. Salah satunya Desa Giriwinangun yang terletak di Kecamatan Rimbo Ilir, Kabupaten Tebo, Jambi.Desa Giriwinangun merupakan desa ke-11 yang diresmikan sebagai Desa Sadar Jaminan Sosial Ketenagakerjaan tahun ini. Rencananya 198 desa lain bakal diresmikan sebagai desa Sadar Jaminan Sosial Ketenagakerjaan.Direktur Kepesertaan BPJS Ketenagakerjaan E. Ilyas Lubis mengatakan melalui Desa Sadar Jaminan Sosial Ketenagakerjaan diharapkan mampu memberikan kontribusi positif kepada masyarakat pekerja dengan meningkatnya kesadaran untuk memiliki jaminan sosial."Semoga dengan penobatan Desa Giriwinangun sebagai Desa Sadar Jaminan Sosial Ketenagakerjaan, kesejahteraan masyarakat di desa ini akan terus meningkat. Sebab selaras dengan semangat Nawa Cita yaitu membangun Indonesia dari pinggiran dengan memperkuat daerah atau desa," ujar Ilyas melalui keterangannya, Jambi, Kamis (31/10).Program yang digagas BPJS Ketenagakerjaan itu memberi cakrawala kepada seluruh masyarakat untuk memunculkan kesadaran bahwa jaminan sosial merupakan suatu kebutuhan. Dukungan dari pemerintah provinsi, pemerintah kabupaten, hingga aparat desa sangat diperlukan sebagai bentuk bahwa negara hadir dalam perlindungan jaminan sosial ketenagakerjaan bagi masyarakat.Ilyas melanjutkan, salah satu syarat dinobatkannya sebuah desa sebagai desa Sadar Jaminan Sosial Ketenagakerjaan adalah terdaftarnya para aparatur desa pada program perlindungan jaminan sosial ketenagakerjaan. "Jika seluruh aparat desa sudah memahami pentingnya akan jaminan sosial ketenagakerjaan, diharapkan seluruh masyarakat pekerja di desa ini juga bisa teredukasi dengan baik."Inisiatif dari 2017Inisiatif awal pembentukan Desa Sadar Jaminan Sosial ini bermula pada 2017. Sebanyak 276 desa dinobatkan sebagai Desa Sadar Jaminan Sosial Ketenagakerjaan yang kemudian dilanjutkan pada 2018 sebanyak 201 desa. "Jadi, di penghujung 2019 nanti Indonesia sudah memiliki 675 desa yang resmi menjadi Desa Sadar Jaminan Sosial Ketenagakerjaan," ujar Ilyas.Menurutnya, semakin luas sebaran desa yang dinobatkan sebagai Desa Sadar Jaminan Sosial Ketenagakerjaan maka akan semakin banyak masyarakat yang memahami pentingnya program perlindungan jaminan sosial yang diselenggarakan oleh BPJS Ketenagakerjaan."Karena target kami adalah mencapai universal coverage bagi seluruh pekerja di Indonesia," tegasnya.

Giriwinangun in Jambi Officially Becomes Social Security Aware Village
01 Nov 2019, 18:15 by BPJS Health, https://www.facebook.com/CNNIndonesia


Through the Social Security Awareness Village program, the community can understand the importance of the social security protection program organized by the BPJS Employment. (Photo: Doc. BPJS Employment)

Jakarta, CNN Indonesia - BPJS Employment has its own way of providing an understanding of the importance of social security to all Indonesian citizens. This was realized through the Employment Social Security Awareness Village program, which has now reached hundreds of villages throughout Indonesia. One of them is Giriwinangun Village which is located in Rimbo Ilir Subdistrict, Tebo Regency, Jambi. Giriwinangun Village is the 11th village that was inaugurated as the Social Security Employment Awareness Village this year. It is planned that 198 other villages will be inaugurated as Social Security Employment Awareness villages. Director of BPJS Employment E. Ilyas Lubis said that through the Social Security Employment Awareness Village is expected to be able to make a positive contribution to the working community by increasing awareness to have social security. "Hopefully with the coronation of Giriwinangun Village As a Social Security Employment Awareness Village, the welfare of the people in this village will continue to increase because it is in line with Nawa Cita's spirit to build Indonesia from the periphery by strengthening regions or villages, "Ilyas said through his statement, Jambi, Thursday (10/31). initiated by BPJS Employment gives horizons to the whole community to raise awareness that social security is a necessity. Support from the provincial government, district government, to village officials is needed as a form that the state is present in the protection of labor social security for the community. Ilyas continued, one of the conditions for the appointment of a village as a village Social Security Labor Awareness is the registration of village apparatus in the guarantee program social employment. "If all village officials understand the importance of labor social security, it is expected that all working communities in this village can also be well educated." Initiatives from 2017 The initial initiative for the establishment of the Social Security Awareness Village began in 2017. A total of 276 villages were named Social Security Awareness Villages. Employment which was then continued in 2018 totaling 201 villages. "So, at the end of 2019, Indonesia will already have 675 villages that officially become the Social Security Employment Awareness Village," said Ilyas. According to him, the wider the village distribution that has been named the Social Security Employment Awareness Village, the more people will understand the importance of insurance protection programs. "Because our target is to achieve universal coverage for all workers in Indonesia," he said.
